value.0:
Few mortals can claim to have held the hand of Magic. Even fewer may claim that It yet walks with them. Beldor, through a series of events that can scarce be comprehended on a conscious level, has come to be one of these lucky few.

The Weave courses through his body, overlaps his veins, and meshes with his very soul. He is able to absorb raw magical energy from mythals and store it as easily as one might store a thought.

When he taps into this energy, he erupts with pure magical radiation that bolsters magical effects. Intangible shards of mythal form out of the air and swirl about him. His spellcasting begins to blend seamlessly into his melee skills and he wields his natural talent as readily as one wields a blade. Every swing of his blade becomes a flowing somatic component. Every exhalation becomes latent with the tongues of arcane creativity. He and the Weave move as one.
